channel.title: Speaking on Trisha Gee

item.title: Speaker Tips - Wearing a Roaming Mic is More Complicated Than I Realised
item.description: I realise I have a bunch of experience and advice for speakers and potential speakers that I simply haven’t written down or shared. Here’s the first piece on things to consider that you might not have thought about. Note: as usual, my advice is from the point of view of a woman (me) and is aimed mostly at women, but also as usual it’s probably useful for others to know too.
